column4: Hello all, can someone offer me some help in choosing an IM program?
I use GAIM but was looking for something to do video conference; does GAIM do that?
OK, thanks... Is there a IM program with video capability?
Gaim is planning to have video and voice support in the next major release... so not for a while. Kopete has some support for it I think.... aMSN has support for it for MSN messenger only
